Widget.name: Responsive Wrapper
Widget.Description: This widget can be used to make a simple responsive design. Use two widgets one to left, the other to right.

Option.name: Minimum width
Option.Description: Specifies the minimum width(px) before the responsive rule applies.

Option.name: Percentage Width
Option.Description: The width(%) used when your page is greater than the minimum width.

Option.name: Position
Option.Description: Specifies the position of the wrapper.
